page.title: 09NEW SCHOOLS
page.content: When the building for the new school (to be named White Styles Middle School)was ready in 1974, the old school building was left empty. In 1978 Dr.J.Sibley Hibbs opened the building as the Community Centre. There are 2 main roons,an office,a kitchen, a committe room, toilets and a store room. On the south end of the building are living quarters which are in need of repair. Sompting Community Centre Playgroup meets there on three mornings (mon,wed,fri) from 9.00 to 12.00. The children are aged between 3 & 5 years and are given a third of a pint of milk and a biscuit. The children were playing with a climbing frame,sand,lego, a train, painting, play-do,strickler bricks, car etc. There are eighteen children on the roll,sixteen of whom were present.
